head.supplied: Christmasday ¶ 1866 ¶ ¶ This note, dear Prof Owen, appeared in the Melbourne Herald of the 17. inst. & the other in the Australasian of this week. ¶ The existence of a Casuarius in this continent ma...

div.p: Natural History Museum, Zoology Library, John Gould. Australian collection, Zoology Library MSS Gou B. Mueller, Ferdinand, (Cassowary).

This note, dear Prof Owen, appeared in the Melbourne Herald of the 17. inst. & the other in the Australasian of this week.
A cutting from the Melbourne Herald, 17 December 1866 (M to the Editor, Herald, 15 December 1866 [in this edition as 66-12-15c]) is attached to the front page of the letter, and a longer cutting from the Australasian, 29 December 1866, p. 5 (M to the Editor, Australasian, 15 December 1866) to the inside pages. The existence of a Casuarius in this continent may interest you & I shall not fail to send a specimen to the British Museum whenever it can be obtained.
